resources.string: There are no hotels in kapurthala in the vicinty of the SSB Board, The nearest accommodation available is a gurudwara that\'s at walking distance from the bus stand\nThe Name Of The Gurudwara Is State Gurudwara

Selection Centre North was raised on 01 
 Jul 2015 in its interim location at Kapurthala, 
 It has two Services Selection Boards 
 namely 31 SSB and 32 SSB. 
 The motto of the centre is "NISHPAKSH, NIHSWARTH, NISSANDEH”

1.Moorish Mosque, Kapurthala 
 2.Pushpa Gujral Science City 
3.Shalimar Gardens
4.Panch Mandir
5.The city of Jalandhar Is Also A Great 
 Place To Visit

1.Buses-buses ply in to kaputhala from nearby major cities 
2.Trains- The city is well connected by 
Trains 
3.Flights-The nearest Airport is Sri 
Guru Ram Dass Jee International Airport in Amritsar

1.Hotel Kanha Shyam 
 2.Hotel UR, Stanley Rd 
 3.Arjun Hotel, Allahabad Junction 
 4.Hotel Vineet, Johnstonganj 
 5.Hotel Vilas, Circuit House

Address: Cariappa Rd, Canton, Civil Lines, Prayagraj, Uttar Pradesh 211001 
 Phone Number: 0532-2422680, 0532-2422688, 0532-2296987 
 Fax – 0532-2424815 
 E-mail: sce-ald-army@nic.in

1.Prayagraj Fort 
 2.All Saints Cathedral 
 3.Khusro Bagh Allahabad Prayagraj 
 4.St. Patrick Catholic Church

SCE has got five boards of Indian Army, which are 11 SSB,14 SSB,18 SSB,19 SSB and 34 SSB. SCE has got a good atmosphere with all modern facilities like \nSTD, Mess, Olive Green Restaurant, outdoor and indoor games, medical facilities, good dormitories, facilities of waterman etc. There is ATM in the vicinity as well.\nCandidates who have applied for CDSE, NDA, 10+2 Teach Entry of Army, SSC-Tech and TGC etc. can get this selection center.
In order to report for the SSB,\n one has to report at the railway station itself in front of MCO

Selection Centre Bhopal was established in October 1975 and it is located in the area of Sultania Infantry Lines, Bhopal Military Station.\n It has three Services Selection Boards namely 20 SSB, 21 SSB and 22SSB.
Distance from the nearest railway station-\n The centrer is approximately 4.8 kms from Bhopal Junction railway station

1.Upper Lake: The largest artificial lake in Asia. 
 The Boat Club is also located there and national level water sporting events are organized by the club. 
 2.Van Vihar National Park: A zoological park with the status of a national park, it is situated south of the Upper Lake. 
 3.Takri: A hindu and jain temple, situated on a hill cliff, 
 this place is popular for the scenic views it offers of the city below.

1. Hotel Naina Palace 
 2.Hotel Prakash INN 
 3. Hotel PR Plaza 
 4.Hotel Prime 
 5.Hotel Panchwati

Address: Jaipur-Guna Road Chandukheri, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh 462001
 Phone Number: 0755–2731245, 0755–2731255, 0755–2702223 
Fax – 0755–2735980 
Email: selectioncentrebhopal@gmail.com

This is a centre for both Army and Navy officer Selection. It has got two boards for Army, 17 SSB and 24 SSB and one board for Navy that is 12 SSB. SCS is equipped with good facilities to make a comfortable and memorable stay for the candidates. It has got Indoor and out games, excellent dormitories, mess, canteen, CSD facility, Telephone, Internet, Reading, TV etc.

There are numerous trains connecting Bangalore with the rest of India. There is train service available from the Bangalore station to other parts of India. By road Bangalore is connected to Pune, Mysore etc. The Bus stand is called Majestic. There are flights connecting Bangalore to other parts of Indian as well. The Bengaluru International Airport is the Airport for Bangalore.

Since the reporting point for the candidates is the Railway station hence it is advised to them to stay near the railway station.
 1.Hotel Shangrila 
 2.Hotel Select 
 3.Star Deluxe Lounge

Address-Cubbon Road, Bangalore – 560042 Fax – 080-25587883/25594954 Phone – 080-25591075 Extn 6804, 9916322971/9480948061 E-Mail – bloressb@rediffmail.com Reporting Point – Bangalore City Railway Station.
